head.title: Seeking New Answers In Trade Center Attack

hedline.hl1: Seeking New Answers In Trade Center Attack

block.p: The first trial of the slender young man whom prosecutors call Ramzi Ahmed Yousef, who is accused of being the mastermind of the World Trade Center bombing, could provide clues to what motivated one of the worst terrorist attacks on American soil, and who was behind the bombing. Opening statements are scheduled to start today in Mr. Yousef's trial in a related terror case, on charges that he and his accomplices plotted to blow up American jetliners in Asia.
